cards.name: Beric Dondarrion
cards.text: Renown. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Beric Dondarrion is attacking, choose a character controlled by the losing opponent. Until the end of the round, that character cannot kneel or stand. (Limit once per round.)

cards.name: Ser Andrew Estermont
cards.text: Interrupt: When a unique [baratheon] character you control would be killed, kill a R'hllor character to save that character. (Limit once per round.)

cards.name: Allard Seaworth
cards.text: Dominance Action: Discard a facedown card attached to a [baratheon] card you control to gain 1 power. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Maester Cressen
cards.text: Shadow (1). Reaction: After Maester Cressen comes out of shadows or is killed, place the top 2 cards of your deck facedown under your agenda.

cards.name: Blackhaven Rider
cards.text: Reaction: After Blackhaven Rider enters play, each player must kneel a loyal character they control, if able.

cards.name: Shadowed Acolyte
cards.text: While an opponent controls a card in shadows, Shadowed Acolyte gains insight.

cards.name: Deepwood Motte
cards.text: Reaction: After a Winter plot card is revealed, kneel Deepwood Motte to kneel X locations with printed cost 1 or lower. X is the reserve value on the revealed Winter plot card.

cards.name: Lady Marya
cards.text: You may marshal or play facedown cards attached to Lady Marya as if they were in your hand. Reaction: After you win a challenge as the attacking player, kneel Lady Marya to attach the top card of the losing opponent's deck to Lady Marya facedown under your control, as an attachment with the text: "Location only. Terminal."

cards.name: The Laughing Storm
cards.text:
Unique [baratheon] location you control only.
While you control more standing characters than each opponent, cards cannot be discarded from your hand.
cards.flavor: "Ha ha ha! Ha ha ha ha ha!"
cards.designer: Card inspired by 2010 Joust World Champion, Alec Irwin.

cards.name: The Usurper
cards.text: Lord character only. While no opponent controls a King character, attached character gains the King trait and renown. While an opponent controls a King character, attached character gets +4 STR.

cards.name: King Robert's Legacy
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which a King character you control is attacking, choose a participating kneeling character and take control of it. (Max once per round.)
cards.flavor: "Your Grace's royal brother was renowned for turning fallen foes into friends." <cite>Asha Greyjoy</cite>

cards.name: Robert's Rebellion
cards.text: Forced Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, if you have lost a [power] challenge this round, discard 3 power from your faction card, if able.

cards.name: The Knight
cards.text: Pillage. Challenges Action: Choose an opponent. Return 2 characters from that player's discard pile to their hand. Then, raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 during the next challenge you initiate against that player this phase. (Limit once per round.)

cards.name: Tarle the Thrice-Drowned
cards.text: Reaction: After a Drowned God or Ironborn character you control is placed in your dead pile, put that character into play. Then, kill a character you control. (Limit once per round.)

cards.name: Victarion Greyjoy
cards.text: Reaction: After a phase begins, kneel a character you control. If it has the: - R’hllor trait, Victarion Greyjoy gains insight and is immune to opponent's character abilities until the end of the phase. - Drowned God trait, Victarion Greyjoy gains renown and cannot be killed until the end of the phase.

cards.name: Ralf Kenning
cards.text:
Pillage.
Reduce the income and reserve values of each opponent's revealed plot card by 1.
cards.designer: Card design by 2022 Joust Castle Stahleck Champion, Marti Foz Hernandez

cards.name: Maester Joseran
cards.text: Reaction: After you become the first player, each player places the top card of their deck facedown under their agenda.

cards.name: Great Kraken's Crew
cards.text: No attachments. Shadow (2). Reaction: After Great Kraken's Crew comes out of shadows, choose a defending character with printed cost 3 or lower. That character does not contribute its STR to the challenge.

cards.name: Old Captain
cards.text: While Old Captain is standing, it gains renown.

cards.name: Winterfell
cards.text: Reaction: After a character is sacrificed or killed, if there is a Winter plot revealed, kneel Winterfell to discard the top X cards of its owner's deck. X is that characters printed cost. -2 Initiative.

cards.name: Harren the Black
cards.text: Unique [greyjoy] location you control only. Forced Reaction: After a character you control discards a card using pillage, discard the top card of each player's deck.

cards.name: Nightfall
cards.text: While attached character has the House Harlaw trait, it gains renown. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which attached character is participating, kneel Nightfall to have each player check reserve.

cards.name: The Drowned God Wakes
cards.text: Reaction: After you win dominance by 15 or more STR, kneel your faction card to kill each character.

cards.name: Cast Me Forth
cards.text: You may ambush non-unique Drowned God characters from your dead pile as if they were in your hand. Each Drowned God character in your hand or dead pile gains ambush (X). X is that card's printed cost.
cards.flavor: "When he cast me forth again he gave me eyes to see, ears to hear, and a voice to spread his word, that I might be his prophet and teach his truth to those who have forgotten." <cite>Aeron Damphair</cite>

cards.name: Tywin Lannister
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Tywin Lannister is attacking, he gains 1 power for every 2 gold in your gold pool. +1 Income.

cards.name: Grand Maester Pycelle
cards.text: Interrupt: When a card is discarded from a player's hand, place it facedown under its owner's agenda instead of placing it in its owner's discard pile. (Limit twice per round.)

cards.name: Qyburn
cards.text: Shadow (3). Reaction: After Qyburn comes out of shadows, choose a non-Army character in an opponent's dead pile and put it into play under your control. If that character is still in play at the end of the phase, shuffle it into it's owners deck.

cards.name: Myrcella Baratheon
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Myrcella Baratheon is participating, return her to your hand. Then, you may initiate an additional [intrigue] challenge against the losing opponent this phase.

cards.name: Warrior's Sons
cards.text: No attachments. Reaction: After power is gained by or moved to Warrior's Sons, stand it. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Tywin's Whisperer
cards.text: Reaction: After a character with printed cost 2 or lower is returned to an opponent's hand, put Tywin's Whisperer into play from your hand. Then, until the end of the phase, it gains a [power] icon and stealth.

cards.name: Castamere
cards.text: Reaction: After claim is applied for an [intrigue] challenge in which you won by 5 or more STR, kneel and sacrifice Castamere to apply [military] claim.

cards.name: Kingswood
cards.text: Reaction: After a character you control enters play using ambush, kneel Kingswood and return it to your hand to draw 1 card. +1 Initiative.

cards.name: Lann the Clever
cards.text: Unique [lannister] location you control only. Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge, kneel Lann the Clever and return a participating [lannister] character to your hand to gain 3 gold. (Cannot be canceled.)

cards.name: Boots
cards.text:
Unique character with printed cost 3 or lower only. Ambush (1).
Attached character gains renown.

cards.name: A Lannister's Honor
cards.text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge as the attacking player, the losing opponent must choose and kill a character with the lowest STR among characters they control. (Max 1 per challenge.)
cards.flavor: "The Lannisters have no honor." <cite>Ser Jorah Mormont</cite>

cards.name: The Sack of King's Landing
cards.text: Each [lannister] character you control gains pillage during [intrigue] challenges. Reaction: After a location enters an opponent's discard pile, that player must choose and kill a character they control with equal printed cost.
cards.flavor: "The lion of Lannister flew over the ramparts, not the crowned stag. And they had taken the city by treachery." <cite>Eddard Stark</cite>

cards.name: The Old Hawk
cards.text: While there is a Summer plot revealed, each [martell] character you control with 6 or more STR gains renown.
cards.flavor: He had never gotten on with Anders Yronwood; there was bad blood between their Houses going back a thousand years, from when the Fowlers had chosen Martell over Yronwood during Nymeria's War.

cards.name: Ser Arys Oakheart
cards.text:
Renown.
While Ser Arys Oakheart is attacking, at least one character must be declared as a defender, if able.

cards.name: Tyene Sand
cards.text: Stealth. Reaction: After you lose dominance, move 1 power from the winning opponent's faction card to a character you control.

cards.name: Ser Willam Wells
cards.text: Challenges Action: Kill Ser Willam Wells to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a [military], an [intrigue] and a [power] icon.

cards.name: Scheming Snake
cards.text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After Scheming Snake enters play, choose a participating character with fewer than 2 challenge icons. That character does not contribute its STR to this challenge.

cards.name: Water Gardens Sentry
cards.text: While you control a [martell] Lord or Lady character, Water Gardens Sentry may be declared as a defender during [intrigue] challenges.

cards.name: The Throne of Dorne
cards.text: Reaction: After you lose dominance, kneel The Throne of Dorne to choose a [martell] card you control and place it in shadows.

cards.name: The Stepstones
cards.text: Bestow (2). Forced Reaction: After you lose a [military] challenge, give control of The Stepstones to the winning opponent unless you discard 1 gold from it. +2 Income. +1 Initiative.

cards.name: Nymeria of Ny Sar
cards.text: Unique [martell] location you control only. Reaction: After you win a challenge by 5 or more STR, kneel your faction card to choose and reveal a [martell] or Summer plot card. (Cannot be canceled).

cards.name: Vulture King
cards.text: Attached character gains pillage. Reaction: After attached character discards an attachment or location using pillage, choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a [power] icon.

cards.name: A Bed of Scorpions
cards.text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge, choose and kill a participating character without an [intrigue] icon.
cards.flavor: Lord Tyrell and his train traveled to Sandstone, where his lordship was murdered in a bed of scorpions.

cards.name: The Dornish Wars
cards.text: Each character controlled by an opponent cannot gain challenge icons. Reaction: After you win a challenge, choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a challenge icon of your choice. (Limit 3 times per phase.)

cards.name: Bowen Marsh
cards.text: Insight. Shadow (4). Reaction: After a card you control comes out of shadows, choose a character and a challenge type. Until the end of the phase, that character cannot be declared as an attacker in challenges of that type. (Limit 3 times per phase.)

cards.name: Maester Harmune
cards.text: Reaction: After gold is moved from an opponent's gold pool to your own, draw 1 card. Then, you and that player each choose a card in hand, and place it on top of its owner's deck. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Gared
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. Interrupt: When an Omen plot card is revealed, kneel each opponent's faction card.

cards.name: Marsh's Conspirator
cards.text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After Marsh's Conspirator comes out of shadows, choose a character. Until the end of the phase, treat it as if its printed text box were blank (except for Traits).

cards.name: Desperate Deserter
cards.text: Shadow (0). Forced Reaction: After a card comes out of shadows under your control, give control of Desperate Deserter to an opponent. -1 Income.

cards.name: Highborn Recruit
cards.text: Action: Kneel Highborn Recruit to choose a character with 1 or fewer challenge icons. Until the end of the phase, that character gains renown or insight.

cards.name: Sentinel Stand
cards.text: While Sentinel Stand is standing, each character you control with 1 or fewer challenge icons gets +2 STR.

cards.name: Weirwood Grove
cards.text: Reaction: After an opponent reveals a non-Omen plot, kneel your faction card and remove Weirwood Grove from the game to initiate the when revealed ability on that card as if you had just revealed it.

cards.name: Legacy of the Watch
cards.text:
Unique [thenightswatch] location you control only.
You may look at the bottom card of each opponent's deck.
If the bottom card of an opponent's deck is a character, you may marshal or ambush it as if it were in your hand.

cards.name: Insubordination
cards.text: Terminal. Reaction: After a challenge is initiated against you in which attached character is attacking alone, kneel Insubordination to kill attached character.
cards.flavor: "Do you hear me, boy? I will not have it!" <cite>Janos Slynt</cite>

cards.name: Saved by the Watch
cards.text: Reaction: After a character controlled by an opponent is sacrificed or discarded from play, put it into play and attach Saved by the Watch to it as a Condition attachment with the text: "Terminal. Take control of attached character."

cards.name: The Watch Needs Good Men
cards.text: You may marshal characters from any opponent's discard pile as if they were in your hand.
cards.flavor: "Good steel's always needed on the Wall." <cite>Yoren</cite>

cards.name: Roose Bolton
cards.text: Intimidate. Forced Reaction: After you marshal Roose Bolton, kneel your faction card. Then, kill each other loyal character.
cards.flavor: "A peaceful land, a quiet people."

cards.name: Galbart Glover
cards.text: While there are more Winter plot cards than Summer plot cards revealed, increase the cost for each opponent to marshal or ambush their first character each phase by 1.

cards.name: Jon Snow
cards.text: No attachments except Direwolf. Interrupt: When claim is applied for a [military] challenge, either: standing characters, or kneeling characters must be chosen for claim, if able.
cards.designer: Card design by 2019 World Melee Champion, Richard Walker.

cards.name: Ghost
cards.text: No attachments. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which you control an attacking Direwolf character, draw 1 card. Interrupt: When Jon Snow would be killed, sacrifice Ghost to save him.
cards.designer: Card design by 2019 European Melee Champion, Chris Meeuwsen.

cards.name: Bolton Loyalist
cards.text: Forced Reaction: After you lose an [intrigue] challenge, give control of Bolton Loyalist to the winning opponent unless you sacrifice another character you control.

cards.name: Karstark Bannerman
cards.text: Interrupt: When Karstark Bannerman is sacrificed or killed, each player chooses a character they control and have it gain 1 power, if able.
cards.flavor: "Rickard Karstark killed more than a Frey and a Lannister. He killed my honor." <cite>Robb Stark</cite>

cards.name: Raventree Hall
cards.text: Reaction: After power is gained by or moved to a character you control, gain 1 gold. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Lonely Hill
cards.text: While Lonely Hill is standing, if you have more than 1 plot in your plot deck, you are considered to have 1 fewer plot cards in your used pile.

cards.name: Bran the Breaker
cards.text:
Unique [stark] location you control only.
While you are the attacking player, each character with printed cost equal to or lower than your claim value cannot be killed.

cards.name: Ice
cards.text: Unique [stark] character only. Attached character gets +2 STR. Reaction: After a character is saved, kneel Ice to kill it.
cards.flavor: His father took off the man's head with a single sure stroke. Blood sprayed out across the snow, as red as summerwine.

cards.name: Taste the Blood
cards.text: Reaction: After an opponent's character is killed or sacrificed, stand each Old Gods card you control with an equal or lower printed cost.
cards.flavor: A white-haired woman stepped toward them through a drift of dark red leaves, a bronze sickle in her hand.

cards.name: The Hour of the Wolf
cards.text: When Revealed: Each player sacrifices a non-loyal character, if able.
cards.flavor: Lord Stark would not be dissuaded: the betrayers and poisoners of King Aegon II must pay the price.

cards.name: Aegon Targaryen
cards.text: Renown. Shadow (6). Reaction: After a non-loyal [targaryen] character enters play during the challenges phase, stand Aegon Targaryen. (Limit twice per phase.)

cards.name: Daenerys Targaryen
cards.text: While you control Khal Drogo, he gains intimidate. While you control a Companion character, Daenerys Targaryen gains insight. Reaction: After you win a challenge, gain 1 power for your faction for each unique attacking Bloodrider character. (Limit once per phase.)
cards.designer: Card design by 2019 Joust World Champion, Francis Cote.

cards.name: Black Balaq
cards.text:
Bestow (1).
While Black Balaq is attacking, each defending character gets -X STR. X is the number of gold on Black Balaq.

cards.name: Arstan Whitebeard
cards.text: If you control Ser Barristan Selmy, sacrifice Arstan Whitebeard. While you control no Lord or Lady characters, Arstan Whitebeard cannot kneel.

cards.name: Free Brothers
cards.text: Reaction: After Free Brothers enters play, search your deck for an Ally character with printed cost 3 or lower and place it in your discard pile.

cards.name: Pink Graces
cards.text: Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, each player who did not apply [military] claim this phase may draw 1 card.

cards.name: Summerhall
cards.text: Reaction: After a character's STR is reduced to 0, kneel Summerhall to kill it.
cards.flavor: "And yet Summerhall was the place the prince loved best." <cite>Arstan Whitebeard</cite>

cards.name: Temple of the Graces
cards.text: Interrupt: When claim is applied for a [military] challenge in which you were the attacking player, kneel a Grace card you control to apply [intrigue] claim instead.

cards.name: Aegon the Conqueror
cards.text: Unique [targaryen] location you control only. While you control an attacking Dragon character with printed cost 7 or higher, raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1.

cards.name: The Three Spears
cards.text:
If attached character is Grey Worm, he gains a [power] icon and intimidate.
While attached character is attacking, each defending character gets -1 STR.

cards.name: Naught But Ashes
cards.text: Shadow (1). Challenges Action: Choose a participating character without attachments. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -1 STR for each other card in shadows. (Max once per round.)
cards.flavor: "The traitors want my city, but I'll give them naught but ashes." <cite>The Mad King</cite>

cards.name: Dance of the Dragons
cards.text: Interrupt: When claim is applied for a [military] or [intrigue] challenge in which you were the attacking player, instead of the normal claim effects, kneel a Dragon character you control to move up to 2 power from the losing opponent's faction card to your own.

cards.name: Margaery Tyrell
cards.text: Shadow (5). Insight. Interrupt: When a [tyrell] card is revealed from your hand or deck, place it in shadows. (Limit twice per round.)

cards.name: Willas Tyrell
cards.text:
Insight.
While a character you control is attacking or defending alone, Willas Tyrell contributes his STR towards your side this challenge.

cards.name: Ser Parmen Crane
cards.text: While you control another Rainbow Guard character, Ser Parmen Crane gains renown.

cards.name: Dickon Tarly
cards.text: Reaction: After a [tyrell] character you control stands, stand Dickon Tarly. (Limit once per round.)

cards.name: Blackwater Forces
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. Reaction: After Blackwater Forces stands during a challenge, choose a participating character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +2 STR.

cards.name: Red-Apple Knight
cards.text: While you control exactly 1 unique [tyrell] Knight character, Red-Apple Knight gets +X STR, where X is that character's STR.

cards.name: Highgarden Treasury
cards.text: Reaction: After a character is removed from a challenge, gain 1 gold. (Limit 3 times per round)

cards.name: Olenna's Wheelhouse
cards.text: Bestow (2). Marshaling Action: Kneel Olenna's Wheelhouse and discard 1 gold from it to remove a [tyrell] character you control from the game until the beginning of the next phase.

cards.name: Garth Greenhand
cards.text:
Unique [tyrell] location you control only.
During a challenge, each participating unique [tyrell] character you control gets +1 STR.
+1 Income.

cards.name: The Warden of the South
cards.text: [tyrell] Lord character only. Attached character gains the Commander trait and gets +1 STR. Reaction: After attached characters STR is increased by a card effect, kneel The Warden of the South to stand attached character.

cards.name: Gilbert of the Vines
cards.text: Challenges Action: Reveal the top X cards of your deck. Choose up to 2 cards revealed in this way and add them to your hand. Shuffle the others back into your deck.

cards.name: Chivalry of the South
cards.text: Reaction: After a challenge ends in which there were no participating characters, gain 2 power for your faction.

cards.name: Bloodraven
cards.text: Insight. No attachments. Reaction: After the plot phase begins, sacrifice Bloodraven to choose an opponent. You may look at that opponents chosen plot before you choose your plot this phase.
cards.designer: Card design by 2022 Online World Champion, Alexandre Carry.

cards.name: Jalabhar Xho
cards.text: Marshaling Action: Discard 1 power from your faction card to take control of Jalabhar Xho. (Any player may initiate this ability.)

cards.name: Septa Unella
cards.text: While Septa Unella is participating in a challenge, treat the text box of each non-The Seven character with 1 or more power as if it were blank (except for Traits).
cards.flavor: "Shame upon the sinner, shame, shame."

cards.name: Varys
cards.text: Bestow (3). Stealth. Cards with printed cost X cannot be marshaled, played or put into play. X is the number of gold on Varys. Reaction: After you reveal a Scheme plot card, place 1 gold on Varys or discard 1 gold from Varys.
cards.designer: Card design by 2019 Joust Castle Stahleck Champion, Sebastian Eckl.

cards.name: Belligerent Heir
cards.text: Belligerent Heir gets +1 STR for each gold it has. Reaction: After you initiate a challenge, place 1 gold on an attacking neutral character you control. If you lose this challenge, sacrifice that character. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Little Bird
cards.text: Shadow (1). Forced Reaction: After Little Bird comes out of shadows, each player may draw 1 card.

cards.name: The Blue Fork
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge by 5 or more STR, put The Blue Fork into play from your discard pile. +2 Reserve.

cards.name: The Green Fork
cards.text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge by 5 or more STR, put The Green Fork into play from your discard pile. +1 Income.

cards.name: The Red Fork
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a [military] challenge by 5 or more STR, put The Red Fork into play from your discard pile. +2 Initiative.

cards.name: High Hall Throne
cards.text: You win ties for initiative and dominance. While High Hall Throne is standing, each House Arryn character you control gets +1 STR.
cards.flavor: The wretched boy had started it, looking down on him from a throne of carved weirwood beneath the moon-and-falcon banners of House Arryn.

cards.name: Greyscale
cards.text: Dominance Action: Kneel Greyscale to choose an opponent. Reveal 1 card at random from that player's hand. If that card's printed cost is equal to or higher than attached character's, kill attached character and attach Greyscale to a different character. Otherwise, that player draws 1 card.
cards.designer: Card design by 2017 Joust European Champion, Reinhard Schefcik.

cards.name: Calm as Still Water
cards.text: Interrupt: When a character with printed cost 3 or lower would be killed, save it and return it to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: "The first sword of Braavos does not run" <cite>Syrio Forel</cite>

cards.name: "A Thousand Eyes, and One"
cards.text: Action: Kneel your faction card to choose an opponent. Look at that players hand, or each card in their shadows area. Then, you and that player may each draw 1 card.

cards.name: A Southron Peace
cards.text: When Revealed: Choose an opponent. Until you reveal a new plot card, you and that player cannot initiate [military] challenges against each other.
cards.flavor: "Shouldn't you northmen have a different sort of peace banner? What are the Seven to you?" <cite>Ser Jaime Lannister</cite>

cards.name: At the Tower of Joy
cards.text: When Revealed: Choose a character. Until you reveal a new plot card, that character cannot be killed.
cards.flavor: It was said that Rhaegar had named that place the tower of joy, but for Ned it was a bitter memory.

cards.name: Battle on the Green Fork
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge as the attacking player, increase the claim on this plot card by 1 until the end of the phase. (Limit 3 times per phase.)
cards.designer: Card design by 2023 Online World Champion, Jim Hansen.

cards.name: Burning the Books
cards.text: Treat the text box of each plot in each opponents used pile as if it were blank. When Revealed: Each player must choose a non-The Seven attachment they control, if able, and remove it from the game (cannot be saved).
cards.flavor: Baelor the Blessed had ordered all Barth's writings destroyed when he came to the Iron Throne.

cards.name: City Blockade
cards.text: Each player cannot marshal, play, or put limited cards into play.

cards.name: Enemies In Every Shadow
cards.text: While there are no cards in shadows, each character you control gets +1 STR. Reaction: After you win a challenge, choose and discard a card in shadows controlled by the losing opponent. If that card is a character, place it in it's owners dead pile.
cards.flavor: She wants all our swords kept close to home, to defend the Vale... against what, no one is certain. Shadows, some say.” - Ser Donnel Waynwood

cards.name: The Last Greenseer
cards.text: When Revealed: Until you reveal a new plot card, switch the printed gold, claim, and reserve values on this plot card with those values on another revealed plot card.

cards.name: Open Revolt
cards.text: Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, if you have not lost an [intrigue] challenge this phase, gain 2 power for your faction (4 power instead if you have removed 2 or more Scheme plot cards from the game).
cards.flavor: And who are you, the proud lord said, that I must bow so low?

cards.name: The Gift of Mercy
cards.text: Your plot deck cannot include Omen plot cards. Reaction: After an opponent loses a challenge, place a Valar Morghulis token on a participating character they control. Interrupt: When a character with 3 or more Valar Morghulis tokens is killed, gain 3 power for your faction.
cards.designer: Card design by 2019 Joust European Champion, Alejandro Gomez.

cards.name: The Gold Price
cards.text: Locations you control enter play knelt. Reaction: After a character is discarded at random from an opponent's hand, put it into play under your control. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, sacrifice it unless you pay X gold. X is that card's printed cost.
cards.designer: Card design by 2015 Draft World Champion, Ryan Jones.

cards.name: Uniting the Realm
cards.text:
You may include non-loyal attachments, characters or locations from any faction in your deck.
Your deck may not contain more than 3 different cards from any faction.
cards.designer: Card design by 2018 Joust European Champion, James Waumsley.
